name: Neel
msg:
The one word that comes to mind, when it's you, it's calmness. You've been an embodiment of calmness and stability for as long as I've known you.
Unlike calmness of the stale water, your calmness is of that of the running stream. Through the years, I've seen you strive for something new, something better and try to achieve it. May it be something artsy, something literary, or something totally new and brave like the flash mob.
You've always flown like a stream into them, and all the while stayed calm. And there are very few people that I know of, having this unique combination of two.
Combine all of the above with the skill and perseverence you posses, you're destined for great places.
Never stop trying new experiences out and stay like the calm flowing stream!
Happy 22nd Birthday, Ashna 😁🥳

name: Shivam P
msg:
Hey Ashna, from the very 1st year to the very last year, I have seen a lot of things in you and I loved to see them in you. You are a dedicated person, hard working, honest, simple, the 1st girl I saw taking interest in coding genuinely, then the flashmob dance, the diary lover, the artistic side with the sketches and paintings, I also love that you sleep early and wake up early because I genuinely want to but I find it difficult to follow :( 
I have always said this to you and will say again, I genuinely respect you a lot :)
Finally, happy birthdayyyyy Ashnaaaa♥️♥️🔥

name: Shivani
msg: Happy Birthday, Ashna! You're definitely one of the smartest people I know but that's not the only thing I like about you. I like how you are a true badass who's very kind, poised, soft-spoken and yet immensely strong and firm about your choices. I love how you are confident about your abilities and yet extremely humble. You are what I would call a 'sorted person at a very young age', who knows exactly what she wants in life and is at peace with herself. It's great having you as a friend and I've always got your back. :')
